# ğŸ Python Code Quality Checklist

Before requesting review, ensure:

- [ ] I ran **`make format`**
- [ ] I ran **`make lint`**
- [ ] I ran **`make typecheck`**
- [ ] I ran **`make test`**
- [ ] All CI checks pass
- [ ] Code follows project style & conventions
- [ ] New functions/classes include docstrings
- [ ] Public APIs are typed (type hints)
